General.Name: Magnate Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Magnate Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells aerospace components and assemblies in Taiwan. It offers aerospace components, including landing gear components and assemblies, aerospace comprehensive components and assemblies, engine casing components, and heat exchanger components and assemblies; and other precision machinery components and assemblies, such as food industry machinery. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
